column4: hello, I'm trying to apt-get sth, but an error appears that unable to lock a file
a) use sudo b) stop all other apt using programs
do NOT paste in here and 2nd, this is NOT the error
pastebin the FULL output including the command you ran
not your package is broken but yout package management
did your machine crash while you installed something?
either some debconf is still running or there is a lock file for this debconfig "driver" somewhere
don't thank me since I doubt this helps you much :(
you could try to reboot and try again
you tried to help, you deserve thanks
magic errors! .. now, really thank you, solved
